content.rendered:
Overview

Bhutani Cyberthum

is one of the most futuristic commercial real estate projects in Noida. Located at Sector-140A, Noida Expressway, the project is spread over 27 Acres of plot and includes two imposing towers rising up to 50 stories. Bhutani Infra offers office space, retail space, Mall & other modern features. One of the largest fountains will be part of Cyberthum, Noida.

AN ICON IN ETERNITY
Tallest Commercial Tower in NCR Region –
Leed platinum certified building
– Constructed with the dry wall system technique
– Breathable double skin strategy
– Double glazed unitized façade system
– A helipad and ample parkingfacilities

OFFICE SPACE

RETAIL / SHOPS

MULTIPLEX

FOOD COURT

RESTAURANTS

HYPERMARKET

HIGHLIGHTS

LEAP INTO
THE FUTURE

  • North India’s tallest commercial tower
  • 50 level iconic towers
  • One of North India’s largest musical fountain
  • Mall in the sky
  • Leed platinum certified building
  • A helipad and ample parking facilities
  • The office towers are designed as a vertical campus – Distinct zones for distinct workmodes

LOCATION MAP

  • Cyberthum Is just 30 minutes away from Upcoming Jevar international Airport and is 55 km away from the IGI Airport.
  • A straight stretch connecting Noida and Delhi, the project is just few minutes away from many prime locations Central and South Delhi.
  • 2 minutes from Noida sector 137 Metro station and CBT.
  • Several MNC’s like KPMG, Infosys campus, Samsung, Accenture, TCS in close vicinity.

SITE PLAN

FLOOR PLAN

CONSTRUCTION IMAGE

ABOUT BHUTANI GROUP

Bhutani Infra is a name to trust upon in the Real Estate Domain. Having a rich wealth of knowledge and expertise in Realty domain, they are well known among the customers. They are committed to giving their customers complete satisfaction while buying the house. While planning, every small detail has been taken care of with all the major amenities incorporated. They boast of a strong team of engineers and architects who are highly skilled and committed to building finest structures that offer dream homes to people. The company has taken special care to handle such issues with their state-of-the-art solutions especially meant for the same.

Site Address : Plot No. 1, Sector 140A, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201305

RERA :- UPRERAPRM11044

Do you want to talk with one of our Real Estate Experts?

Call Now: +91 9565 699 699
